projects.title: Landing Page for OnceWear Brand
projects.description: A stylish landing page to showcase your t-shirts, brand story, customer reviews, and an order button.

projects.title: T-Shirt Order App
projects.description: An app where users choose t-shirt type, color, front/back print, and it automatically calculates the price.

projects.title: OnceWear Brand Guide
projects.description: A visual PDF or presentation that includes your brand's logo, color palette, fonts, mockups, and style rules.
features: Useful for marketing, social media, or printing partners

projects.title: Orders Dashboard for OnceWear
projects.description: An admin dashboard to manage and view customer orders, calculate profits, and check most popular designs.

projects.title: Social Media Kit
projects.description: A full set of post templates for Instagram, Facebook, and TikTok for your t-shirt brand or freelance work.
features: Include versions in both Arabic and English

projects.title: Personal Portfolio App
projects.description: A mobile app that introduces you, shows your skills, projects, contact info, and links to your social media.
features: Share with clients or as a QR code on your business card
